metadata.title: CVE-2024-24510 on Ubuntu 22.04 FIPS Undergoing Certification (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Cross Site Scripting vulnerability in Alinto SOGo before 5.10.0 allows aremote attacker to execute arbitrary code via the import function to themail component.

criterions.comment: sogo package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
